name: Earthshaker OG
description: Earthshaker OG, also known as P.O. #3, is a variety of OG Kush from Progressive Options Genetics. The powerful sativa-dominant effects are known to sneak up on you with a smooth and lengthy buzz. The buds express themselves in deep shades of green and smell like a mix of skunk and sharp cheese. The flavors produced by Earthshaker OG are earthy and hashy with sweet notes of citrus and lemongrass.
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Aroused, Creative, Energetic, Headaches, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Pain, Dry Mouth, Dizzy
